website_summaries.verdict: A fantastic quality golf ball that nearly everyone agrees is worth the extra cost.
pros: The durable Pro V1x balls have a softer feel for putting with excellent control
They also have great distance and a low spin
cons: These are some of the priciest golf balls on the market

customer_reviews.title: It's not about the balls
customer_reviews.text: So I'd suppose the golfballs are fine, but when you throw a piece of scotch tape from an everyday dispenser on the bottom of the box, crooked, on both top and bottom, it appears this was a return being sold as new. For when tape attempted to be removed, the box foil came right up with the tape. These were meant to be a gift, but cannot, will not give a gift that appears it once was returned already. Poor etiquette.
customer_reviews.author: Renaldo

customer_reviews.title: You need a fast swing speed.
customer_reviews.text: Great ball. Very Hard, Need to be a good golfer with a very fast swing speed. More for a pro or low handicapper.
customer_reviews.author: Milforddave

customer_reviews.title: Titleist... Pro V 1 Balls...
customer_reviews.text: These balls are the cream of the crop when it comes to Golf. They have excellent response off the club face, great carry and keep in good shape for a very long time. I think you'll love these!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas in Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Excellent performance and durability, plus high visibility
customer_reviews.text: The yellow Pro V1x is a top quality golf ball, with great visibility in the air and on the ground. I find the yellow ball to be a bit more durable than the original white Pro V1x - it seems more resistant to scuffs and abrasions. Titleist balls command a premium price, but are still the best balls on the market. My only complaint is the shipping. The package took 3 weeks to arrive due to Amazon's pandemic prioritization, and it arrived dirty and damaged, like it was run over by a truck. The golf balls, however, were not damaged by the mishandling.
customer_reviews.author: Paul D.

customer_reviews.title: The yellow pro V1X appears to outlast the white equivalent-
customer_reviews.text: I have always used the white pro V1X but found a new yellow ball on the course and put it in play. I just completed my third round with the same ball and it still looks brand new and plays like a new ball. So, I bought two dozen of these balls and haven’t had to put a new ball in play. Interestingly, my white pro V1Xs are usually good for only one round. I’m impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: GolfBalls
customer_reviews.text: Love the higher numbers, got some individuals out on the course trying to hit my balls.
customer_reviews.author: Cam

customer_reviews.title: Favorite golf ball for many golfers.
customer_reviews.text: The golf balls were for a nephew graduating from high school. He has a college scholarship to play golf. He requested the brand and part number for the balls ordered and shipped to his house. He says the balls are exactly what he wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not new as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my husband in March...then Covid-19 hit and he didn't play golf. Yesterday when he pulled these golf balls out-the golf balls had markings on them from when other golfers used them. I made sure I ordered new because my husband has tried re-purposed golf balls before and they just did not work for him. Beware!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Prov v 1x balls
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these pro v1x balls. He was very excited to get these since he hasn't had nice new balls in a long time and he was happy to play with them instead of his old dinged up ,stained ,used balls.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa delucia

customer_reviews.title: The only ball my serious golfer will use
customer_reviews.text: My son-in-law is an avid golfer who loves the game. This is the only ball he will use. These were purchased as a birthday gift for him. He knows golf so they must be great.
customer_reviews.author: Doris

customer_reviews.title: RIPPED OFF!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these and got sent a bunch of USED balls and not a SINGLE one of them is a Titleist Pro V1x ball. This is ridiculous!
customer_reviews.author: Peter Chong

customer_reviews.title: The only golf ball he'll use!
customer_reviews.text: The only golf ball my husband will play golf with. Exceptional price and quality. Definitely a golf game must!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Ritter

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my dad for Christmas (and his birthday and Father's Day). They definitely work properly when hit with a golf club. Great quality. Will continue to buy and gift for every occasion.
customer_reviews.author: supjennifer

customer_reviews.title: Unprofessional
customer_reviews.text: I bought the pro v1x golf balls for a Christmas gift. Being one of the best balls to play with in the game, I expected a little more than the product i got. There was scotch tape wrapped around the entirety of the box looking like it was return then sold again. Will be sending this back. The product is not giftable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shorter isn’t always better.
customer_reviews.text: I normally use the Pro V 1X and get great yardage and direction. This time, they feel like rocks. Shorter distance by yards. Disappointed but I’ll keep working with them.
customer_reviews.author: Ann B.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible delayed shipping!
customer_reviews.text: These had to be seconds, as there were too many flaws on the balls. We love ProVx1 balls, but these were definitely flawed, and shipping was extremely delayed by vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Mtntrek2

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Quite simply the best golf ball on the market for today’s clubs. I know that Bridgestone has a similar ball as does Calloway but neither in my opinion measure up to the Pro V1x.
customer_reviews.author: RobD

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with box was taped and damaged
customer_reviews.text: This was supposed to be a gift but that's out of the question now. In addition to the damage there's also tape on the top side and bottom side of the box that at some point held the box closed. Tape was torn by prior owner to open the box. Are these used.... returned??? Wouldn't have bought them in this condition!
customer_reviews.author: Judith A.

customer_reviews.title: They look good!
customer_reviews.text: Golf balls are great! The box was in perfect condition! I bought them as a gift so I don't know how well they play through.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eleven is the New Dozen?
customer_reviews.text: I received eleven golf balls in a plastic bag with the empty paper sleeves thrown in. ????????
customer_reviews.author: Greg G

customer_reviews.title: Poorly packaged in shipping
customer_reviews.text: The box was beat up when I got it, it did not ship in a cardboard box or anything, just shipped straight up in the Titleist box you would find at a pro shop. The shipping label was on there directly along with a bunch of tape I had to rip off. Not very presentable for a gift for my father. I opened the case to make sure I wasn’t completely ripped off but the name brand golf balls were in there brand new and as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Healy

customer_reviews.title: Titleist Pro V1 Yellow Golf Balls.
customer_reviews.text: Love these golf balls especially the yellow golf balls because I can see the better on the golf course.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Brenden

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Best ball on the market by far Titleist has more patents on golf balls than any other company put together
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great control and perfect spin.  Best gift for any golfer.
customer_reviews.text: Best ball for the money. Great control and spin. Our entire high school team prefers these balls.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy F

customer_reviews.title: It's a PROV1X
customer_reviews.text: Common on, its a PROV. Great ball, always gives me exactly what is should.
customer_reviews.author: eyeonquality

customer_reviews.title: Favorite golf ball
customer_reviews.text: Favorite golf ball. They go further on drives and they stop well on chips
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Best golfball in the world
customer_reviews.text: Best ball in the world This, and the sister ProV1, are the best
customer_reviews.author: Brad J. Bromley

customer_reviews.title: Still one of the best
customer_reviews.text: It was the best ball on the market. Probably still is for the low handicap player.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Use exclusively
customer_reviews.text: Use exclusively for Weekend golf games & country club tourneys 3-5 handicapper. Age 44
customer_reviews.author: B S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a gift for a friend. They were very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: EMB66

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just what my husband wanted but no place close sold them
customer_reviews.author: LR

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: Anyone who has used the Pro V1 or Pro V1x knows that they help you play better.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Very durable but not the same as white balls
customer_reviews.text: More durable than white Pro V1x balls but do not assume these are the yellow version of the white balls. They appear to be firmer and they do not land as softly on the green,
customer_reviews.author: A. Fernandes

customer_reviews.title: Good one
customer_reviews.text: My son in law was greatful..loves the color and top ball!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great balls 😂
customer_reviews.text: Love the pro v1x hard & they fly off the driver
customer_reviews.author: Jim B

customer_reviews.title: Great ball for avid golfers
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my boyfriend for Christmas. His face lit up when he opened them, and said these were the best ball; even better than the Pro V1 that he usually uses. Knowing this info, I will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Levita

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Good item for son for Fathers Day. Very pleased as he said they are great golf balls.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks used but sold as “new”
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a secret Santa gift and the box was completely banged up. There is scotch tape on it that has ALREADY been opened. So disappointed. Two of the sleeves look like they’ve been opened as well.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley S

customer_reviews.title: These are the top of the line
customer_reviews.text: It's TiitlelistPro V1x--the best ball in golf next to Costco's Kirkland. Your average golfer should not play these balls as they're too expensive. There are many fine golf balls in the $20/dozen range.
customer_reviews.author: harry stefchak

customer_reviews.title: Distance is not stable, are these balls new 2019 production?
customer_reviews.text: Distance is not stable, are these balls new 2019 production?
customer_reviews.author: KBC

customer_reviews.title: I'd rather be driving a Titleist
customer_reviews.text: These golf balls speak for themselves...that's why every mfg. is trying to chase them. Best ball on the market period.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Well it is a titleist...
customer_reviews.text: They are titleist, the best ball in golf. Arrived early. Worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Bond

customer_reviews.title: THESE BALLS FLY
customer_reviews.text: The pro v1x is one of the best or not the best ball out there very long off the tee green side control awesome ball wont play anything else
customer_reviews.author: Jared Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but good.
customer_reviews.text: Only thing my husband will play with. Price drives me nuts, but when they take 3 strokes off your game it’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor P.

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: Must be a new model because they last longer than they should
customer_reviews.author: Nate Chapin

customer_reviews.title: Lose them just lime the cheaper balls, only you feel worse.
customer_reviews.text: Lose them just lime the cheaper balls, only you feel worse.
customer_reviews.author: thomas browne

customer_reviews.title: Fraud
customer_reviews.text: This was a fraud, used golfs of different brands were in the box
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad packaging.
customer_reviews.text: Nice but the box was in bad shape and it is a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy B.

customer_reviews.title: Damaged box for new item is unacceptable
customer_reviews.text: Box was ripped up when it arrived. This was to be a gift and I was sad that the box came damaged. For the price I paid i expected it in new shape.
customer_reviews.author: Marge Lewek

customer_reviews.title: Easy to spot and more durable
customer_reviews.text: Amazing golf ball, easier to spot, especially in desert areas and sand. Much durable shell.
customer_reviews.author: Yousif Majid

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in packaging!
customer_reviews.text: There should have been 12 golf balls in this package but only 9 were there! Poor packaging!
customer_reviews.author: Janice Pritchard

customer_reviews.title: Box was torn up
customer_reviews.text: Box was very beaten up - not gift giving condition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great balls , very good playing balls for golf !
customer_reviews.text: Good brand of golf balls , very smooth and even weight , perform great .
customer_reviews.author: Robin Murray

customer_reviews.title: not applicable
customer_reviews.text: I liked this ball,gives me confident on my shot,from tee, to fairway hits.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson U. Marcelo

customer_reviews.title: Looks different than the white ones
customer_reviews.text: Outer cover seems to be harser as compare to white ones
customer_reviews.author: waleed zubair

customer_reviews.title: Short Game Suitable
customer_reviews.text: I like the control around the greens with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Aikens

product_meta.title: Titleist Pro V1x Golf Balls ( One Dozen )
feature_bullets: Very low long game spin and penetrating trajectory
The Package Weight Of The Product Is 36 Pounds
